EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to notify CART Coordinator when Apheresis Pick-Up Scheduled
EmailTemplate.name: NotifyCARTCoordinatorWhenOrderIsScheduled
EmailTemplate.subject: {!$Label.ProductName} - Apheresis Pick-Up Date Scheduled for {!Order__c.PatientID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Order__c.Coordinator__c} ,
The Apheresis Pick-Up Date for your patient with Patient ID: {!Order__c.PatientID__c} has been successfully scheduled for {!Order__c.ApheresisPickUpDate__c}. Please login to the portal to access the patientâ€™s record and verify their order details.
If you have any questions, please reach out to us via +1-XXX-XXX-XXXX.
Thank You, {!$Label.JanssenBiotechAndLegendBiotech}
